description: a(n) = a(n-1) + n^2 if n prime else a(n-1) - n.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..1000
mathematica: nxt[{n_,a_}]:={n+1,If[PrimeQ[n+1],a+(n+1)^2,a-(n+1)]}; Transpose[ NestList[ nxt,{0,0},50]][[2]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 12 2012 *)
prog: (Haskell)a051353 n = a051353_list !! na051353_list = 0 : zipWith (+) a051353_list   (zipWith (\chi x -> x * (chi * (x + 1) - 1)) a010051_list [1..])-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 13 2013
author: Armand Turpel armandt(AT)unforgettable.com
